segments.text: Hello , this is Sunshine Trading Company . Can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I want to apply for the accountant in your corporation and I think it is not beyond attainment .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great . Could you tell me something about cash control ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , of course . In accounting , cash means all items that are acceptable for depositing in a bank .
segments.speaker: S2
